artist: Artist: Hara Yōyūsai; Designer: Sakai Hōitsu
catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 804
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: inro with four sections, depicting three cranes flying together to UR; stylized lines on opposite side, reminiscent of clouds or waves; presently connected with purple cord, orange ojime, and black lacquered netsuke
medium: Black lacquer with gold and silver maki-e and shell inlay; silk cord
provenance: Gift from Mr. and Mrs. Minoru Hosomi, 1987, to Mary Burke
signed: on base: {Yōyūsai} | on body: (Brushed to special order by Hōitsu) | on netsuke: {Shin’yōsai Tōju}
title: Medicine case with cranes and waves
